field.label: Prune archived cards after 120 days
field.comment: All cards (including for guests and 'do not save') are always stored internally. If yes, those records will be permanently removed 120 days after their last use (the maximum refund period). We strongly recommend this.

field.label: Enable public API
field.comment: If 'Yes', Magento's REST and GraphQL APIs will allow customer card management. Only enable this if you use them.

field.label: Require an order to access My Payment Options
field.comment: If 'Yes', customers will only be able to add/edit payment options on their account after placing an order. We strongly recommend this.

field.label: Max checkout errors per session
field.comment: Block a customer from checkout after they fail to submit an order this many times within the time below. This is to help block card testing attacks. Default is 5.

field.label: Max checkout errors timeframe (sec)
field.comment: The amount of time to record and block for checkout errors (for the setting above), in seconds. Default is 86400, one day.
